0.text: Bug 6503  Search page - should offer case sensitivity check box.

1.text: Build 20011127  Due to bug 6423 fix, the API SearchEngine.search(IWorkspace, String, int, int,  IJavaSearchScope, IJavaSearchResultCollector) is now performing a case  insensitive search (more intuitive).

2.text: However, the UI page should offer a checkbox for case sensitivity, and rather  use the following call to trigger the search:  SearchEngine.search(workspace, createSearchPattern(patternString, searchFor,  limitTo, caseSensitiveFlag), scope, resultCollector);
